law.catch_line: The Department shall adopt regulations to carry out the provisions of this subtitle....

text.section: The Department shall adopt regulations to carry out the provisions of this subtitle.

section.section: The regulations adopted under this subtitle shall establish application procedures and criteria for the award of a loan under this subtitle.

text.section: The regulations adopted under this subtitle shall require the recipient of a loan under this subtitle to provide the Department with documentation that the proceeds of the loan were applied in accordance with § 4-603 of this subtitle and the loan agreement.
